About me

Hi, I am Gayan Virajith, a developer (who works on the web) based on Sri Lanka. Graduated from the University College Dublin (National University of Ireland).

I am Working for template-factory.nl also known as Mearch ICT. Prefer to serve with Php and Ruby based stacks and also love to work on Jekyll and Processwire CMS/CMF.

Contact me

Find me on Google+ / Github / Twitter or just say Hello at gayanvirajith@gmail.com.
